name: Star Tender
description:
Made for the Lospec Game Jam 2021

Now that you're the proud owner of PushyBuddy Blower, model 3X179, get to work! The stars are dirty, and it's your job to clean them off.

Or, go into creative mode and push the bits around to make pictures. It's like a Wooly Willy.

(This is the first game I've ever published!)
